channel.title: bread on Walter Zielenski

item.title: Serious Eats' Workhorse Loaf
item.description: Serious Eats has a great recipe for a hand-made loaf of whitebread, however the proper recipe only comes in a long-form article series; the short form they provide does not spell out the same recipe in my opnion. As such, I’ve made my own summary recipe. References: Serious Eats' long form recipe Serious Eats' short form recipe
